resume.description: Full-Stack Engineer with a passion for Software, Databases, and Scalable distributed Systems. Over the 5+ years, I have developed or contributed to nearly 8+ projects in a variety of Work like Developing from Scratch, breaking from Monolith to Micro-Services and other technical works. I have worked with Clients in various domains like Healthcare, Telecommunication, Recruitment Sector and have worked for Companies such as Optum, Amdocs and TCS.
